features.text:
ISA's main vision is to meet the growing demand of maintenance and cleaning industry with our latest art of technology in order to satisfy our customer requirements.

Our vision is to aim to be a company that is closest to the customer, earning the respect and trust of all and contributing cleaner and healthier to a sustainable development of the nation and the society.

features.heading: THE COMPANY'S SUCCESS IS BASED ON A HIGH QUALITY LEVEL
features.text: We do have dedicated teams of personnel with hands on experience that are always committed to provide reliable and competitive services to all our clients. We execute all our jobs timely to a high safety and quality standard. We have been closely associated with a number of reputable suppliers providing supply for the cleaning industries. This is in order to strengthen our position and stay competence, it is our intention to diversify through related integration either backward to source supply or forward to the ultimate of all our customers.

ourMission.text: To promote excellent cleaning services to our customers by providing a customized one-stop cleaning services at an affordable fee.

ourVision.text: ISA'S vision is to provide excellent delivery of comprehensive solutions in cleaning, location maintenance, and specialized services to all sectors of the economy through a committed and qualified team. We use advanced equipment and innovative technology to satisfy the customers' expectations while abiding by quality, security and occupational health regulations. This allows us to reach international markets.

features.heading: POST-CONSTRUCTION CLEANING
features.text: Post-construction cleaning for new and remodelled businesses. Our post-construction cleaning division uses some or all our cleaning capabilities to prepare a building or home.

features.heading: CARPET CLEANING
features.text: All carpets and upholstery will be carefully cleaned using state-of-the-art hot water extraction equipment which reduces drying time, leaving carpets fresh and ready to walk on in just hours.

features.heading: WINDOW CLEANING
features.text: We specialize in interior and exterior window cleaning and offer the best possible service at a reasonable price. Residential and Commercial cleaning available.

features.heading: STRIPPING & WAXING
features.text: High traffic areas are prone to dirt and grit and give a beautiful floor a less-than-professional look. Ensure the appearance and cleanliness of all your floors with cleaning and waxing services.

features.heading: POWER WASHING
features.text: Power Washing can help restore your pathways, entrances or parking areas to its original beauty. The best Power Washing / Pressure Washing for Industrial, Commercial, and Residential buildings in the GTA.
